name: TC_55!308 (Lang: en) | Bid:55!308-en.ae.NoReg
description:
Check: The page is refreshed after clicking the link “educational app Investmate” in the block “Investmate” on
            the page “Mobile apps” when EN language is selected (SCA license).
        Language: EN
        License: SCA
        Author: Kasila
descriptionHtml:
Check: The page is refreshed after clicking the link “educational app Investmate” in the block “Investmate” on
        the page “Mobile apps” when EN language is selected (SCA license).
    Language: EN
    License: SCA
    Author: Kasila
statusMessage:
Failed: #Bug # 55!308 
Expected result: The 'Investmate' app page is opened on Google Play/App Store OR 'educational app Investmate' is presented as simple text.
Actual result: “educational app Investmate” is presented as link and after clicking on it the 'Investmate' app page is not opened on Google Play/App Store. Current page is: https://capital.com/en-ae/trading-platforms/mobile-apps
statusTrace:
self = <US_55-tassobaccato_ReTestsManual_test.TestManualDetectedBugs object at 0x7f1dbf786390>
worker_id = 'master'
d = <selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver (session="e33beec0a1824b37ab2675e25605ac8f")>
cur_language = 'en', cur_country = 'ae', cur_role = 'NoReg'
cur_login = 'test001.miketar+1@gmail.com', cur_password = 'Qwer1234-!@#$'

    @allure.step('Start retest manual AT_55!308 that the "Investmate" app page is opened on Google Play/App Store.')
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('cur_language', ['en'])
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('cur_country', ['ae'])
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('cur_role', ["NoReg", "Auth", "NoAuth"])
    @pytest.mark.bug_308
    def test_308(self, worker_id, d, cur_language, cur_country, cur_role, cur_login, cur_password):
        """
        Check: The page is refreshed after clicking the link “educational app Investmate” in the block “Investmate” on
            the page “Mobile apps” when EN language is selected (SCA license).
        Language: EN
        License: SCA
        Author: Kasila
        """
    
        bid = build_dynamic_arg_for_us_55(
            d, worker_id, cur_language, cur_country, cur_role,
            "55", "ReTests of Manual Detected Bugs",
            "308", 'The "Investmate" app page is not opened on Google Play/App Store'
        )
    
        link = apply_preconditions_to_link(d, cur_language, cur_country, cur_role, cur_login, cur_password)
    
        menu = from_trading_menu_open_mobile_apps.MenuNew(d, link)
        cur_item_link = menu.from_trading_menu_open_mobile_apps(d, cur_language, cur_country, link)
    
        test_element = InvestmateAppPage(d, cur_item_link, bid)
        test_element.investmate_app_page(d, cur_item_link)
>       test_element.assert_(d)
